definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: The building is 3-storey high, which is made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 这座屋子高三层，是用外地的石头制作的。

sentences.english: I heard that when a group of girls tried to escape, they locked them in the rooms and beat them up.
sentences.chinese: 我听说有一群女孩试着逃走，被他们锁在屋子里狠揍。

sentences.english: The room was then full of people chatting animatedly and laughing .
sentences.chinese: 这时满屋子的人又说又笑，兴高采烈。

sentences.english: Nothing was heard in the room but the hurrying pen of the stripling.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里悄然无声，只有年轻人的笔匆忙划过纸页。

sentences.english: Come into the dark room here, and let us have one final word alone.
sentences.chinese: 到这边这个黑屋子里来吧，我俩单独谈谈。

sentences.english: Called Dreaming Roma B&B, it was a 4-roomed apartment.
sentences.chinese: 其实是一个楼里的有4间屋子的公寓。

sentences.english: 6 and the landlord with new tenant at the house.
sentences.chinese: 房东陪着新房客在看屋子。

sentences.english: Several bullets struck the log-house, but not one entered;
sentences.chinese: 有几发子弹打中了木屋子，但是没有穿透进来。

sentences.english: The room is now completely bare.
sentences.chinese: 现在，整间屋子就空空如也了。

sentences.english: Death arrived at his house on the night of his demise.
sentences.chinese: 在男人即将死去的那个夜晚，死神来到了他的屋子。

sentences.english: Can you call the children in the house out to play?
sentences.chinese: 你能让屋子里的孩子们出来玩吗？

sentences.english: The door of the room was shut. The Princess wanted to go in and see what was in this room.
sentences.chinese: 这间屋的门关着，公主要进去看看这间屋子里有什么。

sentences.english: This room, for example, into zillions of tiny little elements.
sentences.chinese: 比方说我们可以把这间屋子，分成大量的小单元。

sentences.english: "Do insides in the house all set out?"Chen Shi lightly continues to ask a access.
sentences.chinese: “屋子里都布置好了么？”沈氏淡淡的继续问道。

sentences.english: Well, you snooped around my house, and went through my stuff.
sentences.chinese: 你巡视我的屋子还检查我的东西。

definition: central room of a traditional Chinese house
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
